basic_info.description: Hello, I'm Ali Amirhamzeh, a dedicated Software Engineer with over 2 years of experience. Specializing in Java and JavaScript, I've developed and maintained platforms using cutting-edge libraries like React and jQuery to create responsive and dynamic user interfaces. As an active member of Agile teams, I collaborate with various stakeholders to deliver high-quality code and effectively prioritize customer requirements. Passionate about continuous learning, I embrace new challenges and adapt to the ever-evolving world of technology.

projects.title: 3D Object Viewer
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working on my internship. I had to develop front-end implementation for app that shows 3D models of known buildings. This was also my first project in Angular framework. I've learned a lot!
